close_reason: Created ProliferatorEditPopover component with mode selection (None/Speed/Product), level selection (Mk.I/II/III), proliferator type selection, and preview showing multiplier effects and consumption rates. Added updateElementProliferator export to use-calculator hook.

close_reason: Added PROLIFERATOR_CHARGES constants and ProliferatorConsumption interface to models.ts. Implemented calculateProliferatorConsumption() function in utils.ts to calculate proliferator consumption per craft and per second.

title: Phase 6: Update Graph Data Builders

close_reason: Updated builder.ts to pass proliferator mode, level, and consumption data to RecipeNode components. Updated totals-builder.ts to aggregate proliferator consumption across all elements and pass proliferatorSummary to TotalsNode components.

title: Phase 1: Fix Input Rate Calculation Logic
description: Fix calculateInputRate() to properly handle product mode proliferators. Speed mode should scale inputs with speed multiplier, product mode should DIVIDE inputs by product multiplier.
close_reason: Fixed calculateInputRate to properly handle product mode. Speed mode scales inputs with speed multiplier (unchanged behavior). Product mode now divides inputs by product multiplier (fixes the bug).

close_reason: Created comprehensive unit tests for calculateInputRate (speed mode scaling, product mode reduction, facility speed multipliers), calculateOutputRate (base rates, speed/product mode multipliers), and calculateProliferatorConsumption (null cases, charges calculation, scaling with facilities and speed, Mk.I/II/III variants).

title: Implement connection-first layout algorithm for totals view
description:
Refactor totals view layout from row-based barycenter to connection-first iterative approach.

Key components:
- moveWithChildren utility for cascading moves
- Phase-based placement (1, 2, 3, 4+ consumers)
- Refinement pass for edge crossing reduction
- Integration with existing totals-builder.ts

See current-feature.md for full specification.

title: Phase 4: Add Store Actions for Per-Recipe Proliferator
description: Implement updateElementProliferator() action to allow per-recipe configuration of proliferator mode and level with cascading recalculation.
close_reason: Implemented updateElementProliferator() action with cascading recalculation. Added helper function getProliferatorItemIdForLevel() to map levels to item IDs. Function properly calculates output rate, facility count, proliferator consumption, and cascades updates through the production tree.
